actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Tactical Air and Land Forces.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Tactical Air and Land Forces

official_title: To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015 to eliminate exceptions to the limitations imposed on the authority of the Secretary of the Army to take certain actions in connection with the transfer of AH-64 Apache helicopters from the Army National Guard.
short_title: Preserving National Guard Combat Readiness Act of 2015

summary.text:
Preserving National Guard Combat Readiness Act of 2015

This bill amends the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015 to eliminate certain authority of the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of the Army to prepare for and transfer up to 48 AH-64 Apache helicopters from the Army National Guard to the regular Army.

titles.title: Preserving National Guard Combat Readiness Act of 2015

To amend the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2015 to eliminate exceptions to the limitations imposed on the authority of the Secretary of the Army to take certain actions in connection with the transfer of AH-64 Apache helicopters from the Army National Guard.
Preserving National Guard Combat Readiness Act of 2015
